Title: A Wrestler Called Goldberg
Writer: Adam F. Goldberg (created by), Vanessa McCarthy, Sally Bradford, Kristopher Valentine (staff writer)
Actors: Wendi McLendon-Covey, Sean Giambrone, Troy Gentile, Hayley Orrantia
Plot: Beverly learns that Barry lied about joining the wrestling team; Erica flakes on a promise to take Adam to a local screening of Return of the Jedi.
